  70. class PermissionRoleAdmin(ModelAdmin):
  71. fieldsets = (
  72. (None, {'fields': ('name', 'codename', 'description')}),
  73. (_('Roles'), {'fields': ('parent',)}),
  74. (_('Permissions'), {'fields': ((
  75. '_permissions', 'list_of_permissions', 'inherited_permissions'),)}),
  76. (_('Users'), {'fields': (('_users', 'list_of_users', 'inherited_users'),)}),
  77. )
  78. filter_horizontal = ('_permissions', '_users',)
  79. list_display = ('name', 'codename', 'description',)
  80. list_filter = ('_permissions__codename',)
  81. readonly_fields = (
  82. 'children_roles',
  83. 'list_of_permissions', 'list_of_users',
  84. 'inherited_permissions', 'inherited_users',)
  85. search_fields = (
  86. 'codename', '_permissions__app_label', '_permissions__codename',
  87. '_users__username', '_users__email'
  88. )
  90. def children_roles(self, obj):
  91. li = u"<li>%s</li>"
  92. ul = u"<ul>\n%s\n</ul>"
  93. row = []
  94. roles = obj.get_descendants()
  95. for role in roles.iterator():
  96. row.append(li % role)
  97. return ul % "\n".join(row)
  98. children_roles.allow_tags = True
  99. children_roles.short_description = _('Children roles')
  101. def inherited_permissions(self, obj):
  102. li = u"<li>%s</li>"
  103. ul = u"<ul>\n%s\n</ul>"
  104. row = []
  105. self_permission_pks = obj._permissions.values_list('id', flat=True)
  106. permissions = obj.permissions.exclude(pk__in=self_permission_pks)
  107. for perm in permissions.iterator():
  108. row.append(li % perm)
  109. return ul % "\n".join(row)
  110. inherited_permissions.allow_tags = True
  111. inherited_permissions.short_description = _('Inherited permissions')
  113. def inherited_users(self, obj):
  114. li = u"<li>%s</li>"
  115. ul = u"<ul>\n%s\n</ul>"
  116. row = []
  117. self_permission_pks = obj._users.values_list('id', flat=True)
  118. users = obj.users.exclude(pk__in=self_permission_pks)
  119. for perm in users.iterator():
  120. row.append(li % perm)
  121. return ul % "\n".join(row)
  122. inherited_users.allow_tags = True
  123. inherited_users.short_description = _('Inherited users')
  125. def list_of_permissions(self, obj):
  126. li = u"<li>%s</li>"
  127. ul = u"<ul>\n%s\n</ul>"
  128. row = []
  129. permissions = obj.permissions
  130. for perm in permissions.iterator():
  131. row.append(li % perm)
  132. return ul % "\n".join(row)
  133. list_of_permissions.allow_tags = True
  134. list_of_permissions.short_description = _('Current permissions')
  136. def list_of_users(self, obj):
  137. li = u"<li>%s</li>"
  138. ul = u"<ul>\n%s\n</ul>"
  139. row = []
  140. users = obj.users
  141. for perm in users.iterator():
  142. row.append(li % perm)
  143. return ul % "\n".join(row)
  144. list_of_users.allow_tags = True
  145. list_of_users.short_description = _('Current users')
  147. admin.site.register(Role, PermissionRoleAdmin)
